page.title: 11SHOPPING
page.content: In Penwortham today the shopping is mostly done locally.People do not think it is a good idea to open shops on Sundays because it would not be fair on the shopkeepers to get out of bed and work. There are lots of food shops in Penwortham and they are quite cheap.For clothes we have to go out of our D-block and into Preston. The shops in Penwortham are very near to the houses so we can do most of our shopping any time we want but most people shop once a week.We have two butchers and one supermarket so most people get their meat from the butchers. The{ trade} in our D-block is fairly high,we get most things we need and anything else we can get in the nearby town;Preston.
